name: Range pseudo-class
description: The pseudo-class **validity** is the selector for elements with range limitations. `:in-range` would match the elements with a value inside the specified range while `:out-of-range` would match the elements which are outside the given range.
example_description: The mentioned example would set the `border-color` to `red` if the value is out-of-range, otherwise the element is going to have a green border.
